document.full_text: before a popular revolt ousted egypt's autocratic president this year, it seemed certain that a film about the desperation of cairo's poor would never reach the country's cinemas.
document.title: egyptian film hopes to be liberated by revolution
lines_and_colors: before a popular revolt ousted egypt's autocratic president this year, it seemed certain that a film about the desperation of cairo's poor would never reach the country's cinemas.
